content.html: Julia Hartley-Brewer deleted her tweet in which she used “autistic” as an insult about Greta Thunberg. Being disabled doesn’t mean you have a bad life, Julia. Having no soul does.
content.value:
Julia Hartley-Brewer deleted her tweet in which she used “autistic” as an insult about Greta Thunberg. 

Being disabled doesn’t mean you have a bad life, Julia. Having no soul does.

photo.alt: JHB screen grab: “I’d choose Andrew Tate’s life every single time over the life of a half educated, autistic, doom-mongering eco-cultist.”
